content.raw:
Possibly related to the other issue I posted recently, I’ve also been experiencing the bridge crashing fairly frequently since updating ignition yesterday, typically within the first few seconds of the simulation when our controller is starting up.

> \[subt\_ros\_relay-3\] process has died \[pid 9176, exit code -11, cmd /…/catkin\_workspace/install/lib/subt\_ros/subt\_ros\_relay \_\_name:=subt\_ros\_relay \_\_log:=/…/.ros/log/5cb40a9c-e6ad-11e9-b705-18dbf251e866/subt\_ros\_relay-3.log\].  
> log file: /…/.ros/log/5cb40a9c-e6ad-11e9-b705-18dbf251e866/subt\_ros\_relay-3\*.log

Unfortunately that log file appears to be empty. The master.log file in that directory though contained this traceback:

> \[rosmaster.master\]\[INFO\] 2019-10-04 09:50:31,095: publisherUpdate\[/clock\] -> [http://…/](http://precision7710c:38051/) \[\]: sec=0.00, exception=\[Errno 111\] Connection refused  
> \[rosmaster.threadpool\]\[ERROR\] 2019-10-04 09:50:31,096: Traceback \(most recent call last\):  
> File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/threadpool.py", line 218, in run  
> result = cmd\(\*args\)  
> File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/master\_api.py", line 210, in publisher\_update\_task  
> ret = xmlrpcapi\(api\).publisherUpdate\('/master', topic, pub\_uris\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1243, in **call**  
> return self.\_\_send\(self.\_\_name, args\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1602, in \_\_request  
> verbose=self.\_\_verbose  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1283, in request  
> return self.single\_request\(host, handler, request\_body, verbose\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1311, in single\_request  
> self.send\_content\(h, request\_body\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1459, in send\_content  
> connection.endheaders\(request\_body\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 1054, in endheaders  
> self.\_send\_output\(message\_body\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 892, in \_send\_output  
> self.send\(msg\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 854, in send  
> self.connect\(\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 831, in connect  
> self.timeout, self.source\_address\)  
> File "/usr/lib/python2.7/socket.py", line 575, in create\_connection  
> raise err  
> error: \[Errno 111\] Connection refused

‌
content.html:
Possibly related to the other issue I posted recently, I’ve also been experiencing the bridge crashing fairly frequently since updating ignition yesterday, typically within the first few seconds of the simulation when our controller is starting up.

[subt_ros_relay-3] process has died [pid 9176, exit code -11, cmd /…/catkin_workspace/install/lib/subt_ros/subt_ros_relay __name:=subt_ros_relay __log:=/…/.ros/log/5cb40a9c-e6ad-11e9-b705-18dbf251e866/subt_ros_relay-3.log].
log file: /…/.ros/log/5cb40a9c-e6ad-11e9-b705-18dbf251e866/subt_ros_relay-3*.log

Unfortunately that log file appears to be empty. The master.log file in that directory though contained this traceback:

[rosmaster.master][INFO] 2019-10-04 09:50:31,095: publisherUpdate[/clock] -> http://…/ []: sec=0.00, exception=[Errno 111] Connection refused
[rosmaster.threadpool][ERROR] 2019-10-04 09:50:31,096: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/threadpool.py", line 218, in run
result = cmd(*args)
File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/master_api.py", line 210, in publisher_update_task
ret = xmlrpcapi(api).publisherUpdate('/master', topic, pub_uris)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1243, in call
return self.__send(self.__name, args)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1602, in __request
verbose=self.__verbose
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1283, in request
return self.single_request(host, handler, request_body, verbose)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1311, in single_request
self.send_content(h, request_body)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1459, in send_content
connection.endheaders(request_body)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 1054, in endheaders
self._send_output(message_body)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 892, in _send_output
self.send(msg)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 854, in send
self.connect()
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/httplib.py", line 831, in connect
self.timeout, self.source_address)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/socket.py", line 575, in create_connection
raise err
error: [Errno 111] Connection refused

‌
